channel.title: Softlayer_billing_invoice_item on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_billing_invoice_item on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item Service Datatype Description Every invoice item is defined in the SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item service. Softlayer billing invoice items have details about the items that reside within an invoice. These items detail, for instance, the recurring and one time charges for each item billed. Methods getAssociatedChildren Retrieve an Invoice Item's associated child invoice items. Only parent invoice items have associated children. For instance, a server invoice item may have associated children.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item Datatype Description Each billing invoice item makes up a record within an invoice. This provides you with a detailed record of everything related to an invoice item. When you are billed, our system takes active billing items and creates an invoice. These invoice items are a copy of your active billing items, and make up the contents of your invoice. associatedMethods SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getObject seeAlso SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice Local associatedInvoiceItemId The associated invoice Item ID.

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item Service Datatype Description Each billing invoice item makes up a record within an invoice. This provides you with a detailed record of everything related to an invoice item. When you are billed, our system takes active billing items and creates an invoice. These invoice items are a copy of your active billing items, and make up the contents of your invoice. Local associatedInvoiceItemId The associated invoice Item ID.

item.title: getAssociatedChildren
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getAssociatedChildren Overview Retrieve an Invoice Item’s associated child invoice items. Only parent invoice items have associated children. For instance, a server invoice item may have associated children. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item[]

item.title: getAssociatedInvoiceItem
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getAssociatedInvoiceItem Overview Retrieve an Invoice Item’s associated invoice item. If this is populated, it means this is an orphaned invoice item, but logically belongs to the associated invoice item. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item

item.title: getBillingItem
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getBillingItem Overview Retrieve an Invoice Item’s billing item, from which this item was generated. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Item

item.title: getCategory
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getCategory Overview Retrieve this invoice item’s “item category”. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Product_Item_Category

item.title: getChildren
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getChildren Overview Retrieve an Invoice Item’s child invoice items. Only parent invoice items have children. For instance, a server invoice item will have children. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item[]

item.title: getFilteredAssociatedChildren
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getFilteredAssociatedChildren Overview Retrieve an Invoice Item’s associated child invoice items, excluding some items with a $0.00 recurring fee. Only parent invoice items have associated children. For instance, a server invoice item may have associated children. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item[]

item.title: getHourlyFlag
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getHourlyFlag Overview Retrieve indicating whether this invoice item is billed on an hourly basis. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values boolean

item.title: getInvoice
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getInvoice Overview Retrieve the invoice to which this item belongs. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice

item.title: getLocation
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getLocation Overview Retrieve an invoice item’s location, if one exists.’ Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Location

item.title: getNonZeroAssociatedChildren
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getNonZeroAssociatedChildren Overview Retrieve an Invoice Item’s associated child invoice items, excluding ALL items with a $0.00 recurring fee. Only parent invoice items have associated children. For instance, a server invoice item may have associated children. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item[]

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getObject Overview getObject retrieves the SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item object whose ID number corresponds to the ID number of the init parameter passed to the SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item service. You can only retrieve the items tied to the account that your portal user is assigned to. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item

item.title: getParent
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getParent Overview Retrieve every item tied to a server should have a parent invoice item which is the server line item. This is how we associate items to a server. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item

item.title: getProduct
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getProduct Overview Retrieve the entry in the product catalog that a invoice item is based upon. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Product_Item

item.title: getTopLevelProductGroupName
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getTopLevelProductGroupName Overview Retrieve a string representing the name of parent level product group of an invoice item. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values string

item.title: getTotalOneTimeAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getTotalOneTimeAmount Overview Retrieve an invoice Item’s total, including any child invoice items if they exist. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values float

item.title: getTotalOneTimeTaxAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getTotalOneTimeTaxAmount Overview Retrieve an invoice Item’s total, including any child invoice items if they exist. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values float

item.title: getTotalRecurringAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getTotalRecurringAmount Overview Retrieve an invoice Item’s total, including any child invoice items if they exist. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values float

item.title: getTotalRecurringTaxAmount
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getTotalRecurringTaxAmount Overview Retrieve a Billing Item’s total, including any child billing items if they exist.’ Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values float

item.title: getUsageChargeFlag
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item::getUsageChargeFlag Overview Retrieve indicating whether this invoice item is for the usage charge. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_ItemObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values boolean
